prompts: Create a lightning-themed Pokemon with a sleek blue body and thunderbolt features.
I want a powerful Electric-type creature that can manipulate storms and weather.
Generate a mythical Pokemon that embodies the essence of thunder and wind.
Make a unique design for a Pokemon that has a cloud-like appearance and muscular arms.
Imagine a legendary creature that harnesses electricity and has an intimidating presence.
Design a bipedal Pokemon with striking blue and gray colors, holding a thunderbolt.
Show me an Electric-type Pokemon that commands storms and has a playful yet fierce demeanor.
